Package openDao.action

Class ContextAction

java.lang.Object
openDao.action.ContextAction
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
@Named("ctx") @SessionScoped public class ContextAction extends Object implements Serializable
Class that defines the context bean where the acces control data related to the user is stored during session
Version:
1.1 Created 18-03-2009 LastModified 27-03-2022
Author:
Alfred Oliver, Vicent Borja
